question: What do the Upanishads teach about Atman and its relationship with Brahman

enhanced_query_object.final_query_string: Brahman and Atman Atman-Brahman ātman Identity of Atman and Brahman Brahman as Atman brahman Atman-Brahman Identity mahāvākya Atman is Brahman advaita tādātmya Atman-Brahman identity
enhanced_query_object.user_query: What do the Upanishads teach about Atman and its relationship with Brahman

query.original: What do the Upanishads teach about Atman and its relationship with Brahman

verses.content: brahman ātman tva darśin api as ced niyuj niyoga aviṣaya api as na kaścit na niyuj iti sarva karman sarva sarvadā kṛ prap
iha api ka idam ātman iti upakram prajñā ātman tva eva prajñāna brahman iti darśay

tad kadācid parama kāruṇika ācārya ātman jñāna prabodha kṛt śabdaka vedānta mahat vākya bherī tad karṇa mūla tāḍay etad eva sṛṣṭi ādi kartṛ tva prakṛ puruṣa pur śī ātman brahman bṛhattatama takāra eka lup tatatama vyāptatama paripṛ ākāśa vat pratibudh paś
tad vāmadeva anya vā evam yathā vac brahman vid prajñā ātman yad eva prajñā ātman pūrva vid amṛta bhū tathā idam api vid etad eva prajñā ātman idam loka utkram ityādi vyākhyā
tad etad prajñāna rūpa ātman brahman apara sarva śarīra stha prāṇa prajñā ātman
